snippet.title: PEGGO! Release Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684820/PEGGO/

PEGGO! is an incremental pachinko-styled game with realistic physics. Drop tokens into the board to earn money, buy upgrades that earn you even more money, and repeat.
